wordslist: Hello, I'm Jesiel.
I am a full stack developer
but I'm changing my career to being a Unity developer.
Work making games is my passion.
And now I'm looking for a job in Victoria BC.

gamemissions.message: I need to create a resume.
Good Job! Now I need to update my LinkedIn.
And Now I need to find a job.

wordslist: Great, I got an answer.
They would like to schedule an interview.

gamemissions.objective: Tap to prepare for an interview.

message: Hi Mary, nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you Jesiel.
We read your resume, it is very interesting.
Can you answer some questions?
Of course!

wordslist: Wow, I got the email saying
they're moving forward with my process.
Now the next step is the technique interview.
I'm going to study and prepare my portfolio.

gamemissions.objective: Tap to study for an interview.

gamemissions.message: I need to create a new portfolio.
I need to fix bugs on my portfolio site nobody is perfect.

message: Hi Tony, how are you?
Hi Jesiel, I'm great, how are you?
I'm great too.
Your portfolio is amazing,
how did you do this project?

wordslist: Unbelievable. I'm in the final round with the CEO.

gamemissions.objective: Tap to study for an interview.
Tap to search everything Google knows about the company.
gamemissions.message: I need to study about that company.

message: Hi my name is Jesiel.
Hi Jesiel, how are you?
I'm a little nervous, but I'll be fine.
Don't worry, let's get to know each other better.
And do you have any more questions for me?
So if I start tomorrow
which project and which role would I start?
Good question!
We have a perfect project for you.
To create a new text based RPG game.
I can really visualize you working with us.
Could you start on Monday?
Yes. It will be a pleasure.

wordslist: Thanks for playing.
Don't forget to follow me
to help me make this dream come true.
I'm sure my creativity and sense of humor
will make a difference in this company.
Thank you so much for playing/watching
and wish me luck.
Goodbye.
